Connect to TT Demo server:
ttConnect()

```{r}
require(rClr)
require(FdkRLib)
ttConnect()
```



<p>Get 10000 bars of EURUSD symbol:</p>
bars = ttBars("EURUSD")

```{r}
bars = ttBars("EURUSD")
View(bars)
```

<p>Get 10000 bar pairs of EURUSD symbol:</p>
bars = ttBarPairs("EURUSD")

```{r}
barPairs = ttBarPairs("EURUSD")
View(barPairs)
```

Get trades of current account
```{r}
trades = ttTrades()
View(trades)
```
